item.title: Mastering the art of client communication
item.dc:creator: twentigauthor
item.content:encoded:
Crafting compelling copy is only half the equation. The other half, the lifeblood of every successful project, is the art of client communication. It's a delicate dance, a symphony of active listening, clear expression, and a dose of empathy. Master it, and watch your collaborations soar.

First, ditch the monologue. Embrace the duet. Clients aren't just recipients of your creative brilliance; they're vital collaborators. Listen intently, not just to their words, but to the melody behind them. What anxieties hum beneath the surface? What unspoken hopes dance in their eyes? Uncover these hidden rhythms, and your work will resonate with a deeper truth.

Transparency is your spotlight. Shine it brightly throughout the process. Don't shroud timelines in mystery or sugarcoat potential roadblocks. Share updates regularly, even the bumpy bits. This builds trust, a bridge over any stormy creative sea. Remember, surprises are for birthday parties, not project management.

Speak their language, not jargon. Ditch the industry lingo, the cryptic acronyms. Craft your message with clarity, like a sculptor chiseling away at unnecessary marble. Aim for simple elegance, where complex ideas pirouette with everyday words. When in doubt, explain like you're talking to a friend over coffee, not a boardroom of suits.

Feedback is fuel, not fire. Embrace it. Don't flinch at critiques, however blunt. See them as brushstrokes refining your masterpiece. Ask clarifying questions, understand the "why" behind the feedback. This isn't a battle; it's a shared quest for excellence.

And finally, remember, communication is a two-way street. Don't be afraid to ask questions, to seek their insights. Their perspective is the secret ingredient that elevates your work from good to remarkable.

Mastering client communication isn't about technical prowess; it's about building bridges of understanding. It's about fostering trust, embracing collaboration, and celebrating the shared journey of creation. So go forth, wordsmith, and paint your masterpiece, not just with pixels or ink, but with the vibrant colours of exceptional communication. The canvas awaits.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: twentigauthor
item.content:encoded:
I’m Louis, a copywriter who loves to play with words.

Whether it’s a catchy slogan, a captivating story, or a persuasive newsletter, I know how to make your message stand out. I have over 12 years of experience, helping my clients communicate their brand identity and values.

What I do

Me, myself & I

I was born and raised in Paris, the city of lights and love. I’ve always been fascinated by the power of words, how they can inspire, persuade, and connect people. I started writing as a hobby when I was a kid, and turned it into a profession when I graduated from Sorbonne University with a degree in literature.

Writing is not only my job, but also my passion. I enjoy exploring different genres, styles, and tones, and finding the best way to express the voice of my clients. I’m always eager to learn new things, and I keep myself updated on the latest trends and innovations in the fields I write about.

When I’m not writing, I like to travel, read, and watch movies. I also love to cook, especially French cuisine, and I often host dinner parties for my friends and family. I believe that life is a journey, and I try to make the most of every moment.

Experience

Copywriter, Avantique — Paris, 2018-2021

As a copywriter at Avantique, a leading company in the IT sector, I was responsible for writing and editing compelling and effective copy for various digital platforms. I collaborated with the marketing team to ensure consistency and clarity across all channels.

Content editor, Kitsune — Tokyo, 2012-2018

I managed and supervised the production of high-quality content for Kitsune, a global tech giant. I edited and proofread the articles written by the content writers, and I provided feedback and guidance to improve their skills and performance.

Copywriter, Sparky — London, 2009-2012

I created various types of content for Sparky, a creative agency that specializes in content marketing. I wrote articles, press releases, brochures, and newsletters for different industries and niches, such as education, health, and entertainment.

My values

Originality. I believe that every project is an opportunity to showcase my unique and innovative skills. I always try to find new and exciting ways to express the ideas and messages of my clients.

Professionalism. I take pride in delivering high-quality and error-free content that meets the standards and expectations of my clients. I respect the deadlines and the budget, and I communicate clearly and effectively throughout the process.

Passion. I love what I do, and I do it with passion and enthusiasm. I enjoy working on diverse and challenging projects that allow me to learn and grow as a writer and as a person.

Collaboration. I value the input and feedback of my clients and colleagues, and I welcome constructive criticism and suggestions. I believe that collaboration and feedback are essential for creating the best possible content.

Latest articles

—

item.title: Services
item.dc:creator: twentigauthor
item.content:encoded:
Elevate your business with creative writing.

You have a vision. I have the words. Together, we can create something amazing. I combine creativity, strategy, and research to craft engaging and effective copy that connects with your audience and converts them into loyal customers.

Get in touch

What I do

I specialize in creating copy that is not only catchy and compelling, but also aligned with your brand voice, tone, and values. I also make sure that your copy is optimized for SEO, readability, and conversion. Whether you need to inform, persuade, entertain, or inspire your audience, I can help you achieve your goals with my words.

I work closely with you to understand your needs, expectations, and preferences. I also do extensive research on your target market, competitors, and industry trends. I deliver high-quality copy that is original, relevant, and tailored to your specific audience and purpose. I also offer revisions and feedback to ensure your satisfaction.

My services

Website

I create engaging and persuasive copy for your website pages, such as home, about, services, contact, and more. I make sure that your website copy reflects your brand identity, communicates your value proposition, and guides your visitors to take action.

Blog

My blog posts are informative and entertaining, showcasing your expertise, building trust, and driving traffic to your website. I research relevant topics, keywords, and sources to create original and SEO-friendly content that resonates with your audience.

Newsletter

I write captivating and compelling newsletters that keep your subscribers informed, interested, and loyal. I craft catchy subject lines, headlines, and body copy that spark curiosity and encourage clicks. I also segment and personalize your newsletters to increase your open and conversion rates.

Social media

I craft creative and catchy social media posts and ads that attract attention, generate engagement, and grow your following. I adapt your brand voice and tone to different platforms, such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and LinkedIn.

My clients

  • Fable
  • Zephyr
  • Elevate
  • Flora Beauty
  • BrewBean
  • Ember
  • Spectrum
  • Compass
  • Spark & Co
  • Latte Studio
  • Zenith
  • Loup
  • Moonlit Yoga
  • Patisserie Royale

Testimonials

"Creative and reliable. Highly recommended."

David Lin, Fable Group

"Louis is very talented and skilled. He crafts engaging and persuasive copy that connects with our audience."

Julia Garcia, Flora Beauty

"His copywriting skills are unmatched. Louis delivered beyond my expectations."

Yves Montaigne, Patisserie Royale

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: twentigauthor
item.content:encoded:
Let’s talk about your next project and how I can help.

Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or just want to say hello. You can also find me on social media. I’m always happy to connect and I’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

contact@example.com

Instagram — LinkedIn

item.title: How to tell your most compelling brand story
item.dc:creator: twentigauthor
item.content:encoded:
In a world saturated with logos and slogans, how do you make your brand sing? How do you weave a narrative that cuts through the noise and reaches your audience's hearts, not just their eyeballs? That's where the magic of storytelling comes in. Your brand story isn't just a bio or a mission statement; it's a soul-stirring tapestry woven from purpose, passion, and connection.

But how do you craft this captivating tapestry? The first thread is finding your "why." Why does your brand exist? What void are you filling, what pebble are you skipping across the pond of human experience? Is it about empowering adventure, fostering creativity, or championing sustainability? Dig deep, unearth your brand's beating heart, and let it guide your narrative.

Next, meet your audience. Who are you whispering to? Understand their dreams, their fears, their unspoken yearnings. Tailor your story to resonate with their language, their struggles, their joys. Don't just sell them a product; offer them a solution, a path to becoming the hero of their own stories.

Now, paint with emotion. Facts and figures may inform, but emotions ignite. Is your story one of overcoming adversity, of defying expectations, of rediscovering hope? Let your characters (yes, even brands can be characters!) wear their vulnerabilities on their sleeves. Make your audience laugh, cry, cheer – their investment is your victory.

But don't forget the rhythm and rhyme. Your story needs a structure, a flow that carries the reader along. A relatable beginning, a conflict that sparks curiosity, a resolution that leaves them breathless. Use vivid language, sensory details, and a voice that echoes your brand's essence. Remember, authenticity is your secret weapon.

Finally, remember, your story is never truly finished. It evolves with your audience, adapts to new challenges, and blossoms with each interaction. Embrace the messy beauty of growth, and your brand story will become a living, breathing testament to your journey, inspiring a loyal following who not just buy your product, but believe in your purpose.

So, go forth, storyteller. Find your voice, weave your magic, and let your brand's most compelling story unfold. The world is waiting to listen.
